body_html:
Sorry - I'm confused what you mean by the website not allowing you to connect. I just tried

wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz

The commands all work, indicating remote files exist.

body:
Sorry - I'm confused what you mean by the website not allowing you to connect. I just tried

```
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz
wget --spider https://storage.googleapis.com/cvdf-datasets/mnist/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz
```

The commands all work, indicating remote files exist.
